SmugsFri 16:07 Okay, so everyone do nothing except BM uses item on neighbour, then checks including themselves, and AD checks everyone but themselves

So I go to Smugs with one rune
I also have all the voting auras lol

DetailedDescription: A Greater Potion of Incrimination can make a player appear guilty in every aspect for the rest of the game (or until cleansed)
The target will appear as a killer and as a Witchcraft user
The target's alignment will appear the same as the evil faction with the most living members

Description: A Potion of Clarity allows you to find out a player's alignment

DetailedDescription: A Minor Potion of Incrimination can make a player appear guilty in every aspect for a single night
The target will appear as a killer and as a Witchcraft user
The target's alignment will appear the same as the evil faction with the most living members

Description: A Potion of Acquiescence can be used once to steal any items the target player has
A Potion of Clarity allows you to find out a player's role
A Potion of Cleansing can be used to remove all negative effects applied to a player, like Poison

DetailedDescription: A Potion of Desolation can be used once to destroy all the items that a player carries
There are some powerful relics that cannot be destroyed, such as the Heart of Fenrir
A Potion of Destruction can be used once to destroy one randomly chosen item that the target player carries
There are some powerful relics that cannot be destroyed, such as the Heart of Fenrir
A Potion of Incrimination can make a player appear guilty in every aspect for 3 nights
The target will appear as a killer and as a Witchcraft user
The target's alignment will appear the same as the evil faction with the most living members

Description: A Potion of Inebriation can be used to make a player drunk for the rest of the game, giving them a chance to fail to use their night action
A Potion of Ineptitude will item block a single target for one night, preventing them from using any items they have

DetailedDescription: A Potion of Insight only ever reveals a village aligned role.
If you target village aligned player, it will reveal their full role to you
If you target a non-village aligned player, it will return the role of a randomly selected village aligned player instead of your original target's role
A Potion of Invisibility allows you to hide all visits a player makes in a single night
A Potion of Poison allows you to poison a single player
The poison will last for three night and has a 25% chance of killing the player each night
The poison has an additional, and separate 50% chance to roleblock the player each night also

Description: A Potion of Protection will protect a target from harm for one night
A Potion of Restoration can be used once to recharge a player's limited use abilities (Revivers, Masons, Witches etc)
A Potion of Tenacity can be used once to grant a player immunity from roleblocks tonight
A Potion of Transference allows you to swap avatars with another player
A Potion of Transmutation can be used to give a player a new role from the faction they belong to. It will not affect Night Immune roles.
If used against a player, a Potion of Vulnerability will remove any night immunity from that player tonight
A Potion of Weakness will role block a single target for one night
A small trinket depicting a child in rags giving away their toy to a smaller child. You can't help but feel moved when you look at it.

Message: You find a small trinket depicting a child in rags giving away their toy to a smaller child. It has moved you to give away all your possessions. $$

Reason: You are feeling altruistic tonight, you should be giving items away, not trying to use them, you selfish git.

Description: A crossbow can kill a player at night. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.

The Dagger may be used once per game. If you choose to activate it, you will kill one randomly selected player that visits you that night. Activating the Dagger will not prevent you from being killed.

DetailedDescription: A Hammer of Destruction can be used to destroy one randomly chosen item that the target player carries
You cannot use a Hammer of Destruction and another item on the same night
There are some powerful relics that cannot be destroyed, such as the Heart of Fenrir

Description: A Dreamcatcher will let you know who visited you in the night
You can use a Heavy Shield at night to protect you from a normal kill, but you will roleblock yourself. If you are attacked whilst using the shield, it will be destroyed.
An Iron Collar can save you from a single lynch.
Rusty Armour has a 50% chance to protect you from a single attack.
This crossbow has certainly seen better days. You should take great care when using it, it looks like it has a 50% chance of backfiring.
Steel Armour will protect you from one night kill.

DetailedDescription: Tarot cards allow you to check a player and get back one of their tarot cards
You will be given two cards in the morning. One will be randomly selected from the player, the other will be randomly selected from a different player in the game
A war axe can be used to attack another player, it has a 33% chance of killing them.
The attack has a separate 66% chance to maim the target
A maimed player has a chance to die if they visit anyone in the night, the chance increases the further away their visit target
You cannot use a war axe and another item on the same night
A war hammer can be used to attack another player, it has a 20% chance of killing them.
The war hammer has a separate 75% chance of causing the target a concussion
A concussed player may accidentally visit a neighbour of their night target, the target and each neighbour all have a 33% chance of being visited
You cannot use a war hammer and another item on the same night

Description: A war spear can kill a player at night, but it is heavy and unwieldy so you will roleblock yourself if you choose to use it. It can only be used once. Protection will stop the kill, and if the Huntsman catches you trying to kill someone they are guarding, you will both die.
A Wolf Pelt will protect you from one night kill, but it will make you appear as a Werewolf to the Seer

A Bear Trap can be placed on any player. It will cripple a randomly selected visitor of theirs. Once crippled, if a player tries to visit anyone more than three houses away from them, they will be roleblocked.
The Graveyard Records will reveal the role of a random dead player each morning
An Invisibility Cloak will keep your visits hidden from roles like the Stalker, Harlot or Insomniac
Magi's Circlets were crafted during the ancient Mage War. Wearing one will provide you with protection from other witchcraft uses, role-blocking any that visit you.
Manacles of Spite allow you to roleblock a player each night. If you do, you will also roleblock yourself.
Poisoned Darts allow you poison a player. After being poisoned, a player has a 50% chance of being roleblocked and a 25% chance of dying. The poison lasts for 3 nights. You have 3 dart(s) left.
The Ring of Tenacity prevents its bearer from being Roleblocked
You can use the Martyr's Crown to divert a kill to yourself. If your target is attacked protection will not save you.

DetailedDescription: A Thief's Cowl can be used to steal items from a target player
Using the Cowl will Roleblock you
You cannot use a Thief's Cowl and another item on the same night

Description: A Veil of Shadows will make you appear innocent to intel roles like the Seer or Witch Hunter

The Amulet of Peace will roleblock you if you have killing status. It will roleblock anyone that visits you if they have killing status. During the day, your vote will carry no weight. If you hold the amulet and have the most votes, it will save you from being executed. The Amulet of Peace must be passed to a different player each night.

Confirmation: The Amulet of Peace will pass randomly to a different player if you do not choose one yourself $$

Description: If you are killed at night whilst holding of an Ankh of Possession, you will swap bodies with your killer the following night.
If you are killed at night whilst in the possession of an Ankh of Reincarnation, you will be revived a day later
If you are killed at night whilst in the possession of an Ankh of Retribution, your corpse will attack your killer the following night and attempt to kill them
A Disruption Orb will roleblock anyone visiting you that is not Night Immune. Unfortunately it will also roleblock you at the same time

Ethereal Armour is so light it's almost like it's not there at all. Although it will not protect from normal attacks, each morning Ethereal Armour will cleanse any negative effects from you (like Poison)

DetailedDescription: A Serpentine Talisman allows you to summon snakes at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the snakes to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the snakes will poison one player (randomly) selected from the player and all those that visit the player that night.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to one house away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.
Holding a Serpentine Talisman will protect you from snakes attacking you
A Vermin Talisman allows you to summon a swarm of rats at the house of a target player.
It will take a night for the rats to arrive.
Once they have arrived, the swarm will affect the target and any player visiting the target.
Any player affected by the swarm will be role and item blocked and also be seen visiting one of the targets neighbours as they run away.
The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.
This staff allows you to cast 'Spellbound' on a single target, once per night
Using the staff will prevent you from using other active items
A Spellbound player will appear as a Witchcraft user and give them an extra sleepwalk action each night
The target will not be notified that they are Spellbound
Spellbound is a visible, persistent and removable aura

Description: The Accurrum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated will be shorter than normal
The Concitiorum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated the village will be forced to execute two players.

The Greater Arcanum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated player votes will be completely obscured, although the village will know a vote was cast, they will not know who it is by, or for. Using the Greater Arcanum will stop the village being able to not lynch
The Inordinatum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated every living player will have their identity swapped with a random living player.

The Sanguine Horn is an ancient werewolf relic, it is said to be covered in the blood of Fenrir, the wolf god. It can be sounded once per game, and will trigger a Blood Moon that will afflict approximately 25% of the village with Lycanthropy.

The Tumultum is an ancient device that looks like a brass instrument. Once per game it can be blown. It will disrupt the sleep of everyone in the village - giving everyone a random extra visit and the power of an insomniac that night.

Bracers such as this were gifted by the wolf gods centuries ago to the mortal archers that fought on their side as reward and insurance for their service. It is imbued with magic that will activate should any wolf ever cause harm to its bearer.

DetailedDescription: An Ãrvekni Rune allows you to see everyone that visited a player one night.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: An Avleda Rune allows you redirect all visits to a target player to yourself for one night. This includes item usage and item transfers. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

An AvslÃ¶ja Rune allows you to reveal your full role to another player. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

A DÃ¶lja Rune allows you to cast a shadow over a player for one night, making them appear as an innocent to all intel checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

A Fela Rune allows you to make a player invisible for one night, hiding them from Stalker and Harlot checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A FjÃ¤t Rune allows you to stalk a player at night to find out who they visit
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A HvÃ­sla Rune allows you to talk to a player the following night.
You will be able to toggle the rune on or off
The other player will see all the messages you send at night but will not know who is sending them.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A SjÃ³n Rune allows you to check a player's alignment.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: A TÃ¶frar Rune allows you to check a whether a player uses Witch Craft or not. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A Tysta Rune allows you to silence a player, making their vote count as 0 the next day.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Vahetus Rune allows you to swap avatars with another player.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A VÃ¤lta Rune allows you to make another player's vote be counted twice tomorrow.
The target will have their faith in democracy shaken by receiving such power and will receive a message about strange dreams.
Holding a Rune will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Vibra Rune allows you to check what auras a player has.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Message: You have been isolated, you will not be able to speak tonight

Confirmation: Tonight you will listen around $Smugs
Tonight you will check $Lucky
Tonight you will use your SjÃ³n Rune to check $Smugs

The swarm will move at the end of each night to a random player up to two houses away from their current location.
If the swarm move to a player that is killed on the same night, they will disperse.
If the swarm are currently active, you may use the talisman again to disperse them and then re-summon them on a subsequent night.
This staff allows you to cast 'Spellbound' on a single target, once per night
Using the staff will prevent you from using other active items
A Spellbound player will appear as a Witchcraft user and give them an extra sleepwalk action each night
The target will not be notified that they are Spellbound
Spellbound is a visible, persistent and removable aura

Description: The Accurrum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated will be shorter than normal
The Concitiorum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated the village will be forced to execute two players.

The Greater Arcanum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated player votes will be completely obscured, although the village will know a vote was cast, they will not know who it is by, or for. Using the Greater Arcanum will stop the village being able to not lynch
The Inordinatum can be used once per game. The day after it is activated every living player will have their identity swapped with a random living player.

The Sanguine Horn is an ancient werewolf relic, it is said to be covered in the blood of Fenrir, the wolf god. It can be sounded once per game, and will trigger a Blood Moon that will afflict approximately 25% of the village with Lycanthropy.

The Tumultum is an ancient device that looks like a brass instrument. Once per game it can be blown. It will disrupt the sleep of everyone in the village - giving everyone a random extra visit and the power of an insomniac that night.

Bracers such as this were gifted by the wolf gods centuries ago to the mortal archers that fought on their side as reward and insurance for their service. It is imbued with magic that will activate should any wolf ever cause harm to its bearer.

DetailedDescription: An Ãrvekni Rune allows you to see everyone that visited a player one night.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: An Avleda Rune allows you redirect all visits to a target player to yourself for one night. This includes item usage and item transfers. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

An AvslÃ¶ja Rune allows you to reveal your full role to another player. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

A DÃ¶lja Rune allows you to cast a shadow over a player for one night, making them appear as an innocent to all intel checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

A Fela Rune allows you to make a player invisible for one night, hiding them from Stalker and Harlot checks. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A FjÃ¤t Rune allows you to stalk a player at night to find out who they visit
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A HvÃ­sla Rune allows you to talk to a player the following night.
You will be able to toggle the rune on or off
The other player will see all the messages you send at night but will not know who is sending them.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A SjÃ³n Rune allows you to check a player's alignment.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: A TÃ¶frar Rune allows you to check a whether a player uses Witch Craft or not. Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks. After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later. If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

DetailedDescription: A Tysta Rune allows you to silence a player, making their vote count as 0 the next day.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Vahetus Rune allows you to swap avatars with another player.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A VÃ¤lta Rune allows you to make another player's vote be counted twice tomorrow.
The target will have their faith in democracy shaken by receiving such power and will receive a message about strange dreams.
Holding a Rune will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.
A Vibra Rune allows you to check what auras a player has.
Holding it will make you appear as a Witch Craft user to intel checks.
After use, a Rune must recharge and can be used again by you three nights later.
If you pass the Rune to a different player they will be able to use it immediately.

Description: The Amulet of Peace will roleblock you if you have killing status. It will roleblock anyone that visits you if they have killing status. During the day, your vote will carry no weight. If you hold the amulet and have the most votes, it will save you from being executed. The Amulet of Peace must be passed to a different player each night.
